meanings.sent1: The misdrawn picture had extra arms and legs.
meanings.sent2: The artist realized the misdrawn lines made the face look distorted.
meanings.sent3: The misdrawn cat drawing looked like a strange alien creature.
meanings.sent4: Her misdrawn map led us in circles all day.
meanings.sent5: The misdrawn tree in the painting seemed to dance in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The misdrawn character in the book was described all wrong.
meanings.sent2: The misdrawn details on the poster made the event seem confusing.
meanings.sent3: The misdrawn cake on the menu looked like a giant cookie.
meanings.sent4: His misdrawn conclusions about the situation caused confusion.
meanings.sent5: The misdrawn shadow on the wall looked like a mysterious figure.

meanings.sent1: Her misdrawn words were taken the wrong way by her friend.
meanings.sent2: The misdrawn signals led to a lot of confusion on the road.
meanings.sent3: The misdrawn instructions on the recipe made the dish taste strange.
meanings.sent4: His misdrawn intentions were clear once he explained himself.
meanings.sent5: The misdrawn emotions on her face left everyone puzzled.
